steps.name: User click ADD TO CART option on ‘Canon EOS 5D’ item

User select quantity 1
User click add to Cart button

elements.name: User add a review to Canon EOS 5D item in Desktops tab

steps.name: User click on Canon EOS 5D item
User click on write a review link
user fill the review information with below information

cells: I Love this Camera, it shots the high quality photoes

steps.name: User click on Continue Button
User should see a message with ‘Thank you for your review. It has been submitted to the webmaster for approval.”

User click on Currency
User Chose Euro from dropdown
currency value should change to Euro

elements.name: Add and Remove a Mac book from Cart

steps.name: User click on MacBook  item
User click add to Cart button

user click on red X button to remove the item from cart
item should be removed and cart should show '0 item(s)'
